input.sentences: the red house was so quaint .
the old fireplace is still usable .
output.sentences: The sun shown on the deep red paint as we pulled up to the quaint little farm house.
The yard was lined with trees that looked like they had been grown from saplings with the utmost of care.
As we unpacked the many boxes, mom orchestrated our movements throughout the house.
Some of the old lights in the home had no switches, so we need to use gloves to unscrew the light bulbs.
Luckily for us, there was a usable fireplace that would help provide both light and warmth in the winter to come.
